forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 72. East southeast wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
